answerText: The Sense of an Ending[10] This contemporary author of The Sense of an Ending wrote about Sir Jack Pitman's plot to make the Isle of Wight into a member of the EU in England, England.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 14 - Finals 2 | 10 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A lawyer's letter surprises the narrator of this novel forty years after the suicide of his friend Adrian Finn. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Booker Prize winner about the school age memories of the divorced father Tony Webster who once had a relationship with Veronica.
